TopicTitle: Am I all set for the future of Kerbal Kind?

Articles.Content:
I think I am all set for any future updates for KSP.


  • [li]I have a KSS to check the weather for upcoming launches (If it will be included). [/li]
    [li]I have two rockets (Minmus Base) on Minmus to search signs of life (Due to the frozen lakes) [/li]
    [li]I have a rocket (Mun Base) on Mun for any research on Mun rocks and to place a Kerbin Flag [/li]

KSS:

Minmus Base:

Mun Base:

Is there anything else you guys think I will need? I\'m just running out of Ideas

• [li]Kerbin-synchronous orbit satellite that is directly above KSC[/li]
    [li]Observation bases of the Mun arches and Munoliths[/li]
    [li]Polar landers of kerbin and muns[/li]

• [li]Kerbin-synchronous orbit satellite that is directly above KSC[/li]
    [li]Observation bases of the Mun arches and Munoliths[/li]
    [li]Polar landers of kerbin and muns[/li]

Ohhhh I mite just have to work on that , thanks for the ideas 8)
Here\'s a challenge: Play around with the Damned Robotics pack and start hanging claw-enabled landers on the arches and each other, similar to that Barrel of Monkeys game.

You need to make a deep space network with sats the create line of site to the far sides of planets by bouncing signals off each other.

Also, work on a rescue craft to pick up landed crews and return them to KSC.

Nice work, keep it up and you\'ll win a medal.
What mod did you get the solar panels from?

Space planes! Just getting one to fly is a decent challenge.

Once you\'ve mastered stable aircraft, build a reusable single stage vehicle to visit Mun or Minmus and then return.

What mod did you get the solar panels from?

Kosmos SSPP
